title: Holes in the Floor with Gaspare Randazzo
description:
Joe is joined by hillarious New York High School teacher Gaspare Randazzo. Randazzo shares some hilarious and amazing stories from his time teaching and Joe remembers the time he showed his students people eating live octopus.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
